com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration

Class DefaultConfigurationElementFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration.DefaultConfigurationElementFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationElement, ConfigurationElementFactory

    public class DefaultConfigurationElementFactory
extends Object
implements ConfigurationElementFactory
    The default configuration element factory implementation.

    To allow for easy customisation of new objects, the default configuration element factory contains a list of configuration element customisers. This list is empty by default, but when either the "configuration_element_factory.default.configuration_element_factory.packages" parameter or the "configuration.default.configuration_element.packages" parameter is supplied, all customisers in the given packages that are not annotated with @Ignored will be applied to a new object after it's been created.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONFIGURATION_ELEMENT_CUSTOMISER_PACKAGES
      The name of the configuration parameter that contains a comma-separated list of packages in which will be looked for configuration element customisers.
